comments.author: pusaka
comments.body: I'm looking for a sales structure where do you put it? There's no info on Twitter, including other social media?How will investors buy JACK tokens in this sale, is it specifically for other members?

comments.body: Today we launched the JACK on Ethereum network.Everyone who invested got the coins.We updated Tokenomics, Roadmap. Now JACK is sustainable.Congrats for the ones how got JACK with very cheap Pre-sale price.We are so excited about the whole thing.Get your coins - info@blackjack.funWe have a goal to become the most trusted, honest, and coolest-looking interactive blackjack site on the market.Thank you everyone who is on board! We are doing it all together.Any more questions?

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: I can see Blackjack.fun Launched their Beta version of Blackjack Tournaments. https://blackjack.fun/game/bitcoin-blackjack_v2There are some freeroll tournaments running every hour / 30 minutes. You guys could join in the 10 USDT freeroll tournament to test out the game and win some free money with your blackjack talent .And also you can buy the Jack token from the Website now.  Click on the Buy Jack Button from the Left Navigation bar - You will have a Modal open, You can buy easily from there.
